params.implementation: The address of the implementation contract.
params.initializer: ABI encoded function call to initialize the proxy.
params.saltNonce: a nonce used in combination with the sender's address and initializer to compute the salt.

params.implementation: The address of the implementation contract.

deployProxy(address,bytes,uint256).notice: Deploys a proxy contract using the given implementation and initializer function call.

predictProxyAddress(address,bytes32).notice: Predicts the CREATE2 address of a proxy contract.
